# Step.apply() method

Abstract method that must be implemented by subclasses to define the behavior of the step.

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract apply(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

A promise that resolves when the step is applied.
